externalInformation.information: Collections; Foundations (G-M); Martha Baird Rockefeller Fund for Music Archives (Martha Baird Rockefeller Fund for Music; began in 1957; private philanthropic organization founded by Martha Baird Rockefeller; supported young artists in the early stages of their careers); fund was dissolved in 1982)
